member.name: M:Dynamicweb.DataIntegration.Providers.XmlProvider.XmlDestinationWriter.StringIsFreeOfTroublesomeCharacters(System.String)

member.summary: Flag for finishing the import in ImportDataAddIn. When True update index can be started.
